meanings.definition: To indicate or show that one is not willing to do something
meanings.sent1: She will refuse to eat broccoli for dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always refuses to help with the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cat will refuse to wear the silly hat.
meanings.sent4: The stubborn mule will refuse to move an inch.
meanings.sent5: The child will refuse to go to bed without a story.

meanings.sent1: The city workers collected the refuse from the bins.
meanings.sent2: The refuse was overflowing from the dumpster.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon found a feast in the refuse behind the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The refuse attracted a flock of seagulls looking for food.
meanings.sent5: The refuse truck came to empty the bins on the street.

meanings.definition: To decline to accept or do something
meanings.sent1: He will refuse the invitation to the party.
meanings.sent2: She refuses to buy products tested on animals.
meanings.sent3: The robot will refuse to follow the faulty command.
meanings.sent4: The tree will refuse to bear fruit in poor soil.
meanings.sent5: The student will refuse to cheat on the exam.
